group_1.textLeft: Whoa, seriously?@You've been a Magical Girl for 5 years?

group_1.textRight: I told you,[chara:300301:effect_emotion_angry_0][se:7219_strain] didn't I!@Don't act shocked!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, like I heard ya, but c'mon...@...Seriously?
Anyway, we're both Magical Girls, so @we can like...hang out together, huh?
So what now?@Myako...Mya...Myako-senpai

group_1.textRight: Uh uh, no way. @You're not giving me some weird nickname...

group_1.textLeft: Okay! Myako-senpai,@like whaddya normally do?
Y'know...@Like school? Clubs?

group_1.textRight: Clubs?@Well, I'm president of the chemistry club.

group_1.textLeft: Wow, president, huh?@What a cute president you are!
No, I'm totally not!@I really mean it!
Anyway, chemistry club...@I mean...chemistry?
I'm not good at sciency stuff or@whatever, but...
But isn't chemistry, like, really hard or@something?

group_1.textRight: Well, they study both chemistry @and biology in high school...

group_1.textLeft: Oh.
So, Myako-senpai! @You're a real sci-babe!
Sci-babe! @Y'know, a girl that's into science!
What else?
So what do ya do in the chemistry@club anyway, Myako-senpai?

group_1.textRight: Well, for example, we hold @chemistry events for kids...
I do chemistry demos for @grade schoolers, things like that.

group_1.textLeft: So that's kinda like that guy on TV...
What's his name? @Bill (Beep), right?

group_1.textRight: Do you always beep out your own lines?!

group_1.textLeft: Ha ha![chara:300601:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]@Anyway, it sounds like fun!
Hey! Do ya think I could help @out in that kinda event too?!
Wait, I got a great idea!@I can be your assistant!

group_1.textRight: First of all, you don't have any interest @in science as far as I can tell!

group_1.textLeft: Well, it's just normally I don't like to,@like, think too hard about stuff...
But I'm like totally pumped about doing @events like that, y'know?
It just totally gets me all...y'know...@pumped up, y'know?
Yeah! Besides...
I think I kinda like you, Myako-senpai!
Ding! [chara:300601:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]I just clicked on "like"!

group_1.textRight: No thanks, I don't need your "like"!
And I don't really care what gets you@"pumped up," okay?
I can't just let an airhead like you be my@assistant cause she thinks it'll be fun!

group_1.textLeft: C'mon, don't be such a bummer!@Please! Gimme a chance!
I can't help it, Myako-senpai!@You're just so little and cute...
You're like...super-duper squeezable!

group_1.textCenter: She's not just showing no respect!@She's just downright rude!
